extendedInfo.description: Mr.Papi (red ball guy) is jumping on platforms to get scores.Tilt the device left and right to control him.If he jumps on the same color platforms continuously, you get chain bonus! (IMPORTANT)If he falls out of platforms, the game ends.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is the best relly fun and also easy but also hard at the same time I would definitely recommend this ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: Once you have played it so many times it gets boring. you need someone else to beat other than yourself. So once you are ready to rate post your high-score so other people can try to beat it. My high-score is 1230. I\'ll update my score once I beat it.

reviews.title: PLEASE READ
reviews.comment: They need to make an app that has all the papi games already on it & some sort of video game music within each game AND a PAUSE BUTTON! That would make this perfect! Also, I think it would be cool if you could use the points u score to buy different \"themes\" (colors, settings, etc.) For each game, & different color papi balls & characters to represent papi! That would probably make u ALOT OF MONEY sunslat!

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A game that has potential
reviews.comment: This could be a great and truly enjoyable game, if it wasn\'t for that it starts out way too hard. I\'d like to be able to play it for much more than just a few moments, but the excessive starting difficulty, and how quickly it increases, simply prevents this and takes away the enjoyment. Due to this, I rate it just a decent two stars, but I won\'t uninstall it - it has potential, so I\'m hoping for an update which decreases the difficulty of it, in the future. I will re-rate it, if that update is made. :)
reviews.author: A Google User
